name: "Germies" Baby Support Snake
description:
The list of items to spend your money on is endless when it comes to babies.

There are many products out there designed for pregnancy and babies.  We are told we “need” body pillows for comfortable sleeping while pregnant, Breast feeding pillows, sitting supports, tummy time mats etc.

Not having an income to support buying every single one of these products (let alone the storage space!) we created a solution.  One simple product to cover them all!

Materials required
2.2m (2.4 yards) material 
Matching cotton thread
35cm (14 inch) zip 
1 button 2 - 2.5cm (1 inch)
2 x 4cm (1.5 inch) google sew on eyes
25mm (1 Inch) wide ribbon 20cm (8 inch) long
Stuffing (bean bags beans, polly fill etc)

Skills required
Button holes
Zip Insertion, the pattern includes a zip tutorial

You are purchasing a PDF pattern not the finished product.

name: Angel Advent Calendar PDF Pattern
description:
The fun of Christmas begins with the countdown advent calendar!  Commercial advent calendars never seemed to meet all of our requirements so we made one ourselves.  For us, the Angel represents the true Christmas spirit and we love the option of filling the pockets with a variety of surprises that don’t always have to be a sweet treat.  Stickers, toys or a note to lead to a hidden surprise is always fun and of course, the occasional chocolate or lolly is always welcome.  Also, for families with multiple children the pockets can be filled with the required number of surprises.  No turn taking required, every day, everyone is involved in the countdown.  Your surprises are only limited by your imagination!  Enjoy your Christmas festivities!

Materials required
Background fabric  			
Backing fabric        			
Fabric for pockets 			
Fabrics for Angel                                    
Appliqué thread to match face, dress and numbers
Matching thread for pockets and background
Fusible webbing
2 lengths of Dowel. 	           
Decorative cord 

Skills required
Applique

You are purchasing a PDF pattern and not the finished product.

name: Display Mannequin PDF Pattern Sizes Girls 8 - 14 yrs
description:
Make your Own Display Mannequin.
As a work from home mum with a small hobby business I could not justify the expense of buying a mannequin. But as photos of my clothes on flat backgrounds or on hangers at the back of bedroom doors were not looking good I decided to create my own mannequin.
This pattern will give you 4 sizes to create your own mannequin based on average girl sizes 8, 10, 12 and 14 years.
It is a quick and easy way to create several mannequins that are affordable and made with things around the house. This model is intended for display purposes only not a measurement sewing model. For personal display use only.

Materials required
Approx 1m (1 yard) fabric
Thread
string to use as a drawstring
Filling
Dowel, broom handle, pole
Stand

You are purchasing a PDF pattern and not the made model.

name: Display Mannequin Pattern Sizes Girls 6mths - 6 yrs
description:
Make your Own Display Mannequin.
As a work from home mum with a small hobby business I could not justify the expense of buying a mannequin. But as photos of my clothes on flat backgrounds or on hangers at the back of bedroom doors were not looking good I decided to create my own mannequin.
This pattern will give you 4 sizes to create your own mannequin. 6-12 months, 1-2, 3-4 and 5-6. 
It is a quick and easy way to create several mannequins that are affordable and made with things around the house. This model is intended for display purposes only not a measurement sewing model. For personal display use only.

Materials required
Approx 80cm (1 yard) fabric (smaller sizes use less)
Thread
string to use as a drawstring
Filling
Dowel, broom handle, pole
Stand
You are purchasing a pattern and not the made model.
